creator: tjordan@airnetcom.com
text:
Cannot access the directory org\w3c\dom at line 14.

The org.w3c classes are not included in the jakarta-log4j-1.1.3 zip file.

When compiling the DomConfigurator this message is generated:
"Cannot access the directory org\w3c\dom at line 14."

The org.w3c classes are not included in the jakarta-log4j-1.1.3 zip file.

Where can the org.w3c classes be obtained?
creator: tjordan@airnetcom.com

text:
This is a support question not a bug. Can you please redirect it to the
log4j-user lists? Thank you.
creator: ceki@apache.org
